dcterms:description: STOPP/START v2 is a clinical guideline for managing polypharmacy, which includes recommendations for stopping current drug treatment (STOPP) and for starting new prescriptions (START). It is commonly used for performing medication reviews.
dcterms:title: STOPP/START v2

dcterms:description: The ABiMed project aims to design a clinical decision support system for managing polypharmacy, integrating rule-based systems with advanced user interfaces.
dcterms:title: ABiMed project

dcterms:creator: C. J. A. Huibers

dcterms:description: This dataset consists of coded algorithms derived from the STOPP/START version 2 guidelines for software implementation, developed through a multidisciplinary consensus procedure.
dcterms:title: STOPP/START version 2 coded algorithms
